name: Archery Showdown
description:
Who Will Be the Archer Master?


Archery Showdown is a classic 2D pixel art platformer where you can challange with your friends in an archery-balistic 2D fighting!

* GAMEPAD IS REQUIRED FOR LOCAL PVP!

The Game

Archery Showdown tests your aim in an epic duel to the last arrow! Grab your bow, tighten the string and get ready to fire!
In this exciting 1vs1 game, you will be thrown into a breathtaking arena, where you and your opponent will compete in thrilling archery duels. Challenge yourself in breathtaking environments, from mysterious forests to medieval dungeons and much more.
Test your archery skills as you aim and shoot arrows with precision. The target is your opponent, and the objective is only one: to hit him before he does the same! It will be a test of skill, reactivity and cold blood.
Archery Showdown is a challenging experience suitable for players of all ages, with pixelart graphics, intuitive controls and ever-changing challenges. Whether you're a newbie or an arc veteran, this game will captivate you from start to finish.

Features

  • Play online with Steam Remote Play!
  • 2D platformer in a cute pixel art world!
  • Archery balistic shooting with arrows and powerups.
  • Vast set of arenas to compete.
  • Play with gamepad or keyboard.
